name: [Updated] Dragon Slayer
description:
You will meet the nicest guy there is - the game itself, aka "G".
He will tell you what to do, and what kind of adventure you're about to experience.
But is everything as it seems?

Controls
Movement:
Use either LEFT & RIGHT arrows, or use A & D to move left and right.
To jump press UP or W.

Spin:
Press either SPACE or RETURN.

Minigame controls
To move, use the arrows or WASD.
To place cross, use SPACE or RETURN.
